RelatedSentence: LJUBLJANA , May 19 ( Reuters ) - NLB , Slovenia 's biggest bank , has turned a corner and is doing good business , its chief executive said on Monday , but he warned the state - owned bank still faced significant risks after the government rescued it last year .
